original: Dānaṁ aniṭṭhaphalaṁ akantaphalaṁ amanuññaphalaṁ secanakaphalaṁ dukkhudrayaṁ dukkhavipākanti?
analyzed: dānam aniṭṭha phalam a kanta phalam a manuñña phalam secanaka phalam dukkhudrayam dukkha vipākam ti

original: nanu dānaṁ iṭṭhaphalaṁ kantaphalaṁ manuññaphalaṁ asecanakaphalaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākanti?
analyzed: nanu dānam iṭṭha phalam kanta phalam manuñña phalam asecanaka phalam su khudrayam sukha vipākanti

original: Hañci dānaṁ iṭṭhaphalaṁ kantaphalaṁ manuññaphalaṁ asecanakaphalaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci dānam iṭṭha phalam kanta phalam manuñña phalam asecanaka phalam sukhudrayam sukha vipāka tena vata re vattabbe

original: Dānaṁ iṭṭhaphalaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, cīvaraṁ dānanti?
analyzed: dānam iṭṭha phalam vuttam bhagavatā cīvaram dānan ti

original: Cīvaraṁ iṭṭhaphalaṁ kantaphalaṁ manuññaphalaṁ asecanakaphalaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākanti?
analyzed: cīvaram iṭṭha phalam kanta phalam manuñña phalam asecanaka phalam sukhudrayam sukha vipākanti

original: dānaṁ iṭṭhaphalaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, piṇḍapāto senāsanaṁ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro dānanti?
analyzed: dānam iṭṭha phalam vuttam bhagavatā piṇḍapātaḥ senāsanam gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāro dānanti

original: Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro iṭṭhaphalo kantaphalo manuññaphalo asecanakaphalo sukhudrayo sukhavipākoti?
analyzed: gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāro iṭṭha phalo kanta phalo manuñña phalo asecanaka phalo su khudrayo sukha vipāko ti

original: “pañcimāni, bhikkhave, dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vaṁsaññāni porāṇāni
analyzed: pañcimāni bhikkhave dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vasaññāni porāṇāni

original: asaṅkiṇṇāni asaṅkiṇṇapubbāni, na saṅkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: a saṅkiṇṇāni a saṅkiṇṇa pubbāni na saṅkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ariya sāvakaḥ pāṇātipātam pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirataḥ hoti

original: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ abhayaṁ deti averaṁ deti abyābajjhaṁ deti.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātā paṭivirataḥ bhikkhave ariya sāvakaḥ aparimāṇānam sattānam abhayam deti a veram deti a byābajjham deti

original: Aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ abhayaṁ datvā averaṁ datvā abyābajjhaṁ datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyābajjhassa bhāgī hoti.
analyzed: aparimāṇānam sattānam abhayam datvā averam datvā abyābajjham datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyābajjhassa bhāgī hoti

original: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṁ dānaṁ mahādānaṁ aggaññaṁ rattaññaṁ vaṁsaññaṁ porāṇaṁ asaṅkiṇṇaṁ asaṅkiṇṇapubbaṁ, na saṅkiyati na saṅkiyissati, appaṭikuṭṭhaṁ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: idam bhikkhave paṭhamam dānam mahādānam aggaññam rattaññam vasaññam porāṇam a saṅkiṇṇam a saṅkiṇṇa pubba na saṅkiyati na saṅkiyissati appaṭikuṭṭham samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako adinnādānaṁ pahāya …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave ariya sāvakaḥ adinnādānam pahāya pe
surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhānam pahāya surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhānā paṭivirataḥ hoti

original: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ abhayaṁ deti averaṁ deti abyābajjhaṁ deti.
analyzed: surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhānā paṭivirataḥ bhikkhave ariyasāvakaḥ aparimāṇānam sattānam abhayam deti a veram deti a byābajjham deti

original: Aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ abhayaṁ datvā averaṁ datvā abyābajjhaṁ datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyābajjhassa bhāgī hoti.
analyzed: aparimāṇānam sattānam abhayam datvā averam datvā abyābajjham datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyābajjhassa bhāgī hoti

original: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamaṁ dānaṁ mahādānaṁ aggaññaṁ rattaññaṁ vaṁsaññaṁ porāṇaṁ asaṅkiṇṇaṁ asaṅkiṇṇapubbaṁ, na saṅkiyati na saṅkiyissati, appaṭikuṭṭhaṁ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: idam bhikkhave pañcamam dānam mahādānam aggaññam rattaññam vasaññam porāṇam a saṅkiṇṇam a saṅkiṇṇa pubba na saṅkiyati na saṅkiyissati appaṭikuṭṭham samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vaṁsaññāni porāṇāni
analyzed: imāni kho bhikkhave pañca dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vasaññāni porāṇāni

original: asaṅkiṇṇāni asaṅkiṇṇapubbāni, na saṅkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi
analyzed: a saṅkiṇṇāni a saṅkiṇṇa pubbāni na saṅkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti a paṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi

original: “idhekacco annaṁ deti, pānaṁ deti, vatthaṁ deti, yānaṁ deti, mālaṁ deti, gandhaṁ deti, vilepanaṁ deti, seyyaṁ deti, āvasathaṁ deti, padīpeyyaṁ detī”ti.
analyzed: idha ekaccaḥ annam deti pānam deti vattham deti yānam deti mālam deti gandham deti vilepanam deti seyyam deti āvasatham deti padīpeyyam deti iti
tena hi deyya dhammaḥ dānan ti

original: Deyyadhammo iṭṭhaphalo kantaphalo manuññaphalo asecanakaphalo sukhudrayo sukhavipākoti?
analyzed: deyya dhammo iṭṭha phalo kanta phalo manuñña phalo asecanaka phalo su khudrayo sukha vipāko ti

original: dānaṁ iṭṭhaphalaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, cīvaraṁ dānanti?
analyzed: dānam iṭṭha phalam vuttam bhagavatā cīvaram dānan ti

original: Cīvaraṁ iṭṭhaphalaṁ kantaphalaṁ manuññaphalaṁ asecanakaphalaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākanti?
analyzed: cīvaram iṭṭha phalam kanta phalam manuñña phalam asecanaka phalam sukhudrayam sukha vipākanti

original: dānaṁ iṭṭhaphalaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, piṇḍapāto dānaṁ …
analyzed: dānam iṭṭha phalam vuttam bhagavatā piṇḍapātaḥ dānam

original: Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro iṭṭhaphalo kantaphalo manuññaphalo asecanakaphalo sukhudrayo sukhavipākoti?
analyzed: gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāro iṭṭha phalo kanta phalo manuñña phalo asecanaka phalo su khudrayo sukha vipāko ti
